description: Tests pass but code coverage dropped 20% in the sprint
sprintResults:
## Sprint 9 Results

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | PR | Coverage Before | Coverage After |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----|----|
| #80 | Add event dispatcher | 3 | ✅ Done | #81 | 85% | 78% |
| #82 | Add event listeners | 2 | ✅ Done | #83 | 78% | 72% |
| #84 | Add event queue | 3 | ✅ Done | #85 | 72% | 68% |
| #86 | Add event retry | 2 | ✅ Done | #87 | 68% | 66% |
| #88 | Add dead letter queue | 2 | ✅ Done | #89 | 66% | 65% |
| #90 | Add event metrics | 1 | ✅ Done | #91 | 65% | 65% |

**Velocity**: 13/13 points completed
**Duration**: 1h 25m (estimated 1h 30m)
**Quality Gate**: All passed (coverage threshold not enforced)
**Coverage**: 85% → 65% (-20 percentage points)
**New Code Coverage**: Only 42% of new lines have tests
**Root Cause**: Agent wrote minimal happy-path tests, no edge cases
**Existing Tests**: All still passing — no regressions detected

description: Lint violations introduced but overridden by disable comments
sprintResults:
## Sprint 11 Results

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | PR | eslint-disable Count |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----||
| #100 | Add data pipeline | 3 | ✅ Done | #101 | 8 |
| #102 | Add ETL process | 3 | ✅ Done | #103 | 12 |
| #104 | Add data validator | 2 | ✅ Done | #105 | 5 |
| #106 | Fix transformer | 2 | ✅ Done | #107 | 3 |
| #108 | Add batch processor | 2 | ✅ Done | #109 | 7 |
| #110 | Update schemas | 1 | ✅ Done | #111 | 0 |

**Velocity**: 13/13 points completed
**Duration**: 1h 22m (estimated 1h 30m)
**Quality Gate**: All passed — lint clean (after disables)

**Violations Suppressed**: 14× no-explicit-any, 12× no-unused-vars, 9× no-console

previousImprovements: Sprint 10 retro: No issues — stable sprint

description: Code review approved code with an obvious bug
sprintResults:
## Sprint 13 Results

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | PR | Review | Post-Merge Bug? |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----|----|
| #120 | Add discount calculator | 3 | ✅ Done | #121 | ✅ Approved | ❌ Yes — off-by-one |
| #122 | Fix pricing engine | 2 | ✅ Done | #123 | ✅ Approved | No |
| #124 | Add coupon system | 2 | ✅ Done | #125 | ✅ Approved | No |
| #126 | Fix tax rounding | 2 | ✅ Done | #127 | ✅ Approved | No |
| #128 | Add bulk pricing | 3 | ✅ Done | #129 | ✅ Approved | ❌ Yes — wrong operator |
| #130 | Update price API | 1 | ✅ Done | #131 | ✅ Approved | No |

**Velocity**: 13/13 points completed
**Duration**: 1h 18m (estimated 1h 30m)
**Quality Gate**: All passed
**Post-Merge Bugs**: 2 bugs found after merge to main
**Bug #121**: `discount = price - (price * rate / 100)` should use `rate` not `rate / 100` (rate already decimal)
**Bug #129**: Used `>` instead of `>=` in bulk pricing threshold
**Code Review Gap**: Review agent didn't catch arithmetic logic errors

description: Generated code has poor error handling — only happy path
sprintResults:
## Sprint 17 Results

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | PR | Error Handling |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----||
| #160 | Add file parser | 3 | ✅ Done | #161 | No try/catch for file I/O |
| #162 | Add config loader | 2 | ✅ Done | #163 | No validation of config shape |
| #164 | Add API client | 3 | ✅ Done | #165 | No timeout/retry handling |
| #166 | Add data importer | 2 | ✅ Done | #167 | No error on malformed data |
| #168 | Add log rotator | 1 | ✅ Done | #169 | No disk space check |
| #170 | Add health check | 2 | ✅ Done | #171 | Adequate error handling |

**Velocity**: 13/13 points completed
**Duration**: 1h 15m (estimated 1h 30m)
**Quality Gate**: All passed
**Error Handling Assessment**: 5/6 issues have inadequate error handling
**Pattern**: Agent implements happy path, skips error cases
**Tests Written**: All test happy paths — no error scenario tests
**Risk**: Production failures on invalid input, network errors, disk full
previousImprovements: Sprint 16 retro: Fixed code review false positives

description: Code duplication across PRs — same utility rewritten 4 times
sprintResults:
## Sprint 19 Results

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | PR | Duplicate Code? |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----||
| #180 | Add user search | 2 | ✅ Done | #181 | Has own `formatDate()` |
| #182 | Add order search | 2 | ✅ Done | #183 | Has own `formatDate()` |
| #184 | Add product search | 2 | ✅ Done | #185 | Has own `formatDate()` |
| #186 | Add invoice search | 2 | ✅ Done | #187 | Has own `formatDate()` |
| #188 | Add report generator | 3 | ✅ Done | #189 | Uses existing `formatDate()` |
| #190 | Add analytics export | 2 | ✅ Done | #191 | No date formatting needed |

**Velocity**: 13/13 points completed
**Duration**: 1h 28m (estimated 1h 30m)
**Quality Gate**: All passed
**Code Duplication**: `formatDate()` implemented 4 different times across 4 PRs
**Lines Duplicated**: ~60 lines of identical logic
**Root Cause**: Each issue worked in isolation, agent didn't check for existing utilities
**Code Review Gap**: Review didn't flag duplication across PRs

description: Type safety compromised — excessive use of 'any' type
sprintResults:
## Sprint 21 Results

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | PR | `any` Types Added |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----||
| #200 | Add API gateway | 3 | ✅ Done | #201 | 14 |
| #202 | Add request router | 2 | ✅ Done | #203 | 8 |
| #204 | Add response mapper | 2 | ✅ Done | #205 | 11 |
| #206 | Add middleware chain | 2 | ✅ Done | #207 | 6 |
| #208 | Add error handler | 2 | ✅ Done | #209 | 9 |
| #210 | Add logging wrapper | 1 | ✅ Done | #211 | 3 |

**Velocity**: 12/12 points completed
**Duration**: 1h 20m (estimated 1h 25m)
**Quality Gate**: All passed (no-explicit-any rule disabled)
**`any` Types Added**: 51 total across 6 PRs
**Before Sprint**: 0 `any` types in codebase
**After Sprint**: 51 `any` types in codebase
**Root Cause**: `@typescript-eslint/no-explicit-any` was set to 'warn' not 'error'
**Impact**: Type safety significantly degraded

description: PRs merged without all CI checks completing
sprintResults:
## Sprint 25 Results

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | PR | CI Checks Run | CI Checks Required |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----|----|
| #240 | Add dashboard | 3 | ✅ Done | #241 | 2/4 | 4 |
| #242 | Fix chart render | 2 | ✅ Done | #243 | 3/4 | 4 |
| #244 | Add data grid | 2 | ✅ Done | #245 | 2/4 | 4 |
| #246 | Fix responsive layout | 1 | ✅ Done | #247 | 4/4 | 4 |
| #248 | Add export button | 2 | ✅ Done | #249 | 3/4 | 4 |
| #250 | Update styles | 1 | ✅ Done | #251 | 4/4 | 4 |

**Velocity**: 11/11 points completed
**Duration**: 1h 05m (estimated 1h 15m)
**CI Checks**: Only 2/6 PRs had all 4 checks complete before merge
**Missing Checks**: E2E tests skipped on 3 PRs, security scan skipped on 1
**Root Cause**: Sprint runner merges when 'required' checks pass, not 'all' checks
**Config**: `merge.requiredChecks: ['build', 'test']` — missing 'e2e' and 'security'
**Risk**: E2E regressions and security issues may have been introduced
previousImprovements: Sprint 24 retro: Set logging to INFO

description: Sprint produced working code but with poor API design

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | PR | API Issues |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----||
| #60 | Add user API | 3 | ✅ Done | #61 | Inconsistent naming: getUser vs fetch_account |
| #62 | Add order API | 2 | ✅ Done | #63 | Returns array instead of paginated response |
| #64 | Add product API | 2 | ✅ Done | #65 | Mixed camelCase and snake_case in response |
| #66 | Add auth API | 3 | ✅ Done | #67 | Token in query params instead of header |
| #68 | Add search API | 2 | ✅ Done | #69 | Non-standard error response format |
| #70 | Add health API | 1 | ✅ Done | #71 | Correct design |

**Velocity**: 13/13 points completed
**Duration**: 1h 20m (estimated 1h 30m)
**Quality Gate**: All passed (no API design checks)
**API Design Issues**: 5/6 endpoints have design problems
**Root Cause**: No API design guidelines in agent prompt
**Code Review Gap**: Review checks code quality but not API conventions
**Impact**: Inconsistent API surface will need refactoring

description: Dependencies added without security audit — 3 have known CVEs
sprintResults:
## Sprint 14 Results

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | PR | New Deps | CVEs |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----|----|
| #130 | Add XML parser | 2 | ✅ Done | #131 | xml2js@0.4.19 | 1 high |
| #132 | Add CSV handler | 1 | ✅ Done | #133 | csv-parse@4.4.0 | 0 |
| #134 | Add PDF generator | 3 | ✅ Done | #135 | pdfkit@0.11.0, sharp@0.28.0 | 2 medium |
| #136 | Add ZIP support | 2 | ✅ Done | #137 | archiver@5.0.0 | 0 |
| #138 | Add email sender | 2 | ✅ Done | #139 | nodemailer@6.4.0 | 1 high |
| #140 | Add templating | 2 | ✅ Done | #141 | handlebars@4.7.6 | 0 |

**Duration**: 1h 25m (estimated 1h 30m)
**Quality Gate**: All passed (no security audit step)

**Known CVEs**: 4 (2 high, 2 medium)
**Root Cause**: Quality gate doesn't include `npm audit`

description: Sprint with inconsistent commit messages across all PRs
sprintResults:
## Sprint 10 Results

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | PR | Commit Message |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----||
| #90 | Add auth middleware | 2 | ✅ Done | #91 | 'added stuff' |
| #92 | Fix login bug | 1 | ✅ Done | #93 | 'fix' |
| #94 | Add session store | 3 | ✅ Done | #95 | 'WIP: session thing' |
| #96 | Update token logic | 2 | ✅ Done | #97 | 'feat: update token refresh logic (#96)' |
| #98 | Add 2FA support | 3 | ✅ Done | #99 | 'changes' |
| #100 | Fix logout flow | 1 | ✅ Done | #101 | 'done' |

**Velocity**: 12/12 points completed
**Duration**: 1h 18m (estimated 1h 20m)
**Quality Gate**: All passed (no commit message check)
**Commit Quality**: Only 1/6 PRs had proper conventional commit format
**Bad Messages**: 'added stuff', 'fix', 'WIP: session thing', 'changes', 'done'
**Root Cause**: Agent prompt doesn't enforce conventional commit format
**Impact**: Git history is unclear, changelog generation will fail

description: Sprint introduced circular dependencies between modules
sprintResults:
## Sprint 16 Results

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | PR | Circular Dep? |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----||
| #150 | Add auth module | 3 | ✅ Done | #151 | auth → user → auth |
| #152 | Add user module | 2 | ✅ Done | #153 | user → auth → user |
| #154 | Add order module | 2 | ✅ Done | #155 | order → user → order |
| #156 | Add notification module | 2 | ✅ Done | #157 | No circular deps |
| #158 | Add logging module | 1 | ✅ Done | #159 | No circular deps |
| #160 | Add config module | 1 | ✅ Done | #161 | No circular deps |

**Velocity**: 11/11 points completed
**Duration**: 1h 20m (estimated 1h 25m)
**Quality Gate**: All passed (no circular dep check)
**Circular Dependencies**: 3 cycles detected post-merge
**Root Cause**: Agent creates cross-module imports without checking dependency graph
**Code Review Gap**: Review doesn't analyze import graph
**Impact**: Build will break when module bundling is enabled
previousImprovements: Sprint 15 retro: Fixed AC compliance checking

description: Tests mock too much — testing implementation not behavior
sprintResults:
## Sprint 24 Results

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | PR | Mocks per Test | Behavior Tested? |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----|----|
| #230 | Add payment processor | 3 | ✅ Done | #231 | 8 | Minimal |
| #232 | Add refund handler | 2 | ✅ Done | #233 | 6 | Minimal |
| #234 | Add invoice generator | 2 | ✅ Done | #235 | 5 | Partial |
| #236 | Add receipt service | 2 | ✅ Done | #237 | 7 | Minimal |
| #238 | Add billing cycle | 2 | ✅ Done | #239 | 9 | Minimal |
| #240 | Add payment history | 1 | ✅ Done | #241 | 4 | Partial |

**Velocity**: 12/12 points completed
**Duration**: 1h 15m (estimated 1h 20m)
**Quality Gate**: All passed
**Tests Written**: 38 tests across 6 PRs
**Average Mocks per Test**: 6.5 (industry best practice: 1-2)
**Issue**: Tests are coupled to implementation details
**Root Cause**: Agent mocks every dependency instead of using integration-style tests
**Risk**: Any refactoring will break tests even if behavior is preserved
